content.description: Start lower than "Beef with the Lunch Lady" at the lowest side of the boulder compressing the blocky nose. Starts on 2 slimpers on the block and good feet, move to a jug under the roof and then into the seam at the start of  "Beef with the Lunch Lady." Sneaky toe cams and knee scums were a must for me dear readers."Trend up and right on small crimps and good slopers using heels and toes. Gain the face using a solid crystal crimp and head up into a slopers and a nice glory jug to top it off. Could keep traversing under the roof for more difficulty."
content.protection: 2 pads a blubber is good too
content.location: Starts compressing the blocky nose at the lower left side of the boulder.

content.description: Start on a tiny crimp on the face and a good seem underneath. Trend up and right on small crimps and good slopers using heels and toes. Gain the face using a solid crystal crimp and head up into a slopers and a nice glory jug to top it off. Could keep traversing under the roof for more difficulty.chossy and dabby aka gultch classic. 2 stars anywhere else
content.protection: 2 -3 pads, blubber pad would be good
content.location: started on a tiny crimp on the face ad a good seem underneath

content.description: Overhanging boulder up above Aspen Trail on the way to the Entrance boulders ~10min from parking. Please be wary of ersosion at and around this boulder.
